what: National Road Safety Observatory (ONSV) styles for gt tables
title: National Road Safety Observatory (ONSV) styles for gt tables
text: onsvtables package provides function customizing gt tables National Road Safety Observatory (ONSV) style.

title: National Road Safety Observatory (ONSV) styles for gt tables
text: can install latest release onsvtables CRAN :

title: National Road Safety Observatory (ONSV) styles for gt tables
text: basic example shows solve common problem:
code: library(onsvtables)  df <- data.frame(   var1 = c("lorem", "ipsum", "dolor"),   var2 = c(1, 2, 3) )  tbl_onsv <-   df |>   gt::gt() |>   tab_onsv()

what: Add styles to a {gt} table. — tab_onsv
title: Add styles to a {gt} table. — tab_onsv
text: tab_onsv() uses gt::tab_*() functions customize gt_tbl object.
